meanings.sent1: Her behaviors at the party were polite and friendly.
meanings.sent2: The teacher praised the student's good behaviors in class.
meanings.sent3: His behaviors at the dinner table were impeccable.
meanings.sent4: The cat's behaviors towards the new kitten were cautious.
meanings.sent5: The dog's behaviors showed its excitement to go for a walk.

meanings.definition: Observable actions of a person or animal
meanings.sent1: The zookeeper closely monitored the behaviors of the monkeys.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behaviors of dolphins in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The behaviors of the squirrel stealing nuts amused the park visitors.
meanings.sent4: The behaviors of the bees in the hive were like a well-organized team.
meanings.sent5: The behaviors of the birds in the flock were mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: The way in which a machine or system functions
meanings.sent1: The engineer analyzed the behaviors of the new software.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the behaviors of the engine is crucial for maintenance.
meanings.sent3: The behaviors of the coffee machine in the office always make funny sounds.
meanings.sent4: The behaviors of the traffic lights control the flow of vehicles.
meanings.sent5: The behaviors of the elevator indicate its operational status.
